title: 12/07/21 DPS Hour 1 Chris Simms
itunes:title: 12/07/21 DPS Hour 1 Chris Simms
description:
Chris Simms talks to Dan about how he sees the playoff picture working out. Chris says that Mahomes is not in the MVP conversation.
